questions.question: What is this AI recruitment application?
questions.answer: This application uses artificial intelligence to streamline the hiring process by screening candidates, analyzing resumes, and providing insights to recruiters.

questions.question: How does AI help in recruitment?
questions.answer: AI automates resume screening, matches candidates to job roles, and conducts preliminary assessments to ensure the best-fit candidates are shortlisted efficiently.

questions.question: Who can use this platform?
questions.answer: The platform is designed for both recruiters and job seekers. Recruiters can post job listings and evaluate candidates, while job seekers can apply for positions and take AI-based assessments.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button, enter your details, upload your resume, and verify your email to start applying for jobs.

questions.question: How can I apply for a job?
questions.answer: Once logged in, browse job listings, click on a suitable job, and submit your resume. You may also be required to complete an AI-based skill assessment.

questions.question: How do AI assessments work?
questions.answer: Our AI system evaluates your skills and experience based on the job description. You may be asked to answer questions or complete coding challenges.

questions.question: Can I edit my application after submission?
questions.answer: No, but you can withdraw your application and submit a new one if needed.

questions.question: How will I know if I am shortlisted?
questions.answer: You will receive an email notification and can track your application status in your profile dashboard.

questions.question: How do I post a job listing?
questions.answer: Sign in to your recruiter account, go to the 'Post a Job' section, fill in job details, set AI screening preferences, and publish the listing.

questions.question: How does AI filter applications?
questions.answer: The AI reviews resumes based on keywords, skills, experience, and predefined criteria to shortlist top candidates.

questions.question: Can I manually review applications?
questions.answer: Yes, you can access the list of all applicants and manually review their profiles.

questions.question: How can I conduct interviews?
questions.answer: You can schedule interviews through the platform, use automated AI interviews, or conduct live video interviews.

questions.question: How do I contact shortlisted candidates?
questions.answer: You can send direct messages or emails through the platformâ€™s built-in communication system.

questions.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions to reset it.

questions.question: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use encryption and secure authentication methods to protect user data.

questions.question: How can I contact support?
questions.answer: Go to the 'Help & Support' section on the website or email us at support@example.com.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes, go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Delete Account.' This action is irreversible.
